recipe.title: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipe.description: A flavorful homemade vegetable fried rice made with eggs, fresh vegetables, and soy sauce, perfect for a quick and easy meal.

steps.title: Get Your Ingredients
instructions: 1 1/2 cups of uncooked rice, 2 eggs, 1/2 carrot, 1/2 green pepper, 6 mushrooms, 3 green onions, 1/2 zucchini, 2 tablespoons butter, 1/4 cup soy sauce, and 2 to 3 cups water.

steps.title: Prepare Your Rice and Vegetables
instructions: Prepare 1 1/2 cups of rice according to package directions. Check rice packaging for water ratio (usually 2 to 3 cups).
Bring water to a boil, add rice, stir for 30 seconds, remove from heat, and cover with lid until cooked to your liking.
*Hint: Use a rice cooker if possible for easier cooking.*
Chop 1/2 green pepper, 3 green onions, 6 mushrooms, and 1/2 zucchini into 1/4 inch pieces.
Grate 1/2 carrot using a cheese or vegetable grater.

steps.title: Prepare Eggs
instructions: Scramble 2 eggs in a separate pan until cooked through.

steps.title: Grill Vegetables and Eggs
instructions: When rice has finished cooking, add chopped vegetables, 1 tablespoon of butter, and scrambled eggs to a wok or large pan.
Grill for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring constantly.

steps.title: Fry Rice
instructions: Add the cooked rice to the wok with grilled vegetables and scrambled eggs.
Add remaining 1 tablespoon of butter and stir into the mixture.
Cook for 5 minutes over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally.

steps.title: Stir in Soy Sauce
instructions: Stir in 1/4 cup soy sauce into the fried rice.
Mix thoroughly so that the soy sauce is evenly distributed.

steps.title: Serve Yourselves
instructions: Serve yourselves a bowl of delicious vegetable fried rice.
*Hint: Offer extra soy sauce on the side for those who like more flavor.*

notes: You can customize this recipe by adding tofu, chicken, or shrimp.
Leftovers can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
